title: Speech by Governor Powell on government securities settlement
content: For release on delivery  2:00 p.m. EDT  October 24, 2016     Opening Remarks on Government Securities Settlement    Jerome H. Powell    Member    Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System    at    The Evolving Structure of the U.S. Treasury Market: Second Annual Conference    The Federal Reserve Bank of New York    New York, N.Y.    October 24, 2016
